synopsis: In episode #11 titled 'SOLOOOO', Devam shares a candid and humorous account of his recent knee injury and the challenges of navigating the healthcare system, while also reflecting on personal growth, loneliness, and the importance of self-love. Through his solo journey, he engages with listener questions, offering insights on relationships, emotional intelligence, and the beauty of embracing life's complexities.
quotes: The way you live your life every day is how you end up living your life.
It's a plot point in the grand scheme of things and it adds to the lore in a way.
You have to give yourself small acts of happiness; maybe ice cream on Fridays.
If youâ€™re scared of something, do it anyway.
Cooking isn't that hard; ingredients are just legos.
Open your arms if you want to be held.
Loneliness and melancholy are beautiful feelings; they point to some need of yours that isn't being met.
Love without expectation; it opens you up to feel everything that life has to offer.
You can't take responsibility for someone else's happiness.
Are you able to be okay by yourself? That's the real question.
